item.title: Lesson 2
item.description: LESSON 2 – DEPLOY AN APP The source code for this lesson can be found on github here: https://github.com/mechtronium/starlane/tree/main/tutorial/lesson-2/ SETUP SCRIPTS At the time of this writing Starlane does not persist changes. In order to re-setup localhost and the repository you created in lesson 1 you will need to rerun the create commands–BUT there is a BETTER way! You can run a setup script located in the repository here /tutorial/lesson-2/script/setup.script. The script looks like this:
